apis.description:
Returns the paginated list of external tools for the current context.
See the get request docs for a single tool for a list of properties on an external tool.

operations.notes:
Returns the paginated list of external tools for the current context.
See the get request docs for a single tool for a list of properties on an external tool.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial name of the tools to match and return.

parameters.name: selectable
parameters.description: If true, then only tools that are meant to be selectable are returned

parameters.name: include_parents
parameters.description: If true, then include tools installed in all accounts above the current context

See the get request docs for a single tool for a list of properties on an external tool.

apis.description:

See the get request docs for a single tool for a list of properties on an external tool.

operations.notes:

See the get request docs for a single tool for a list of properties on an external tool.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial name of the tools to match and return.

parameters.name: selectable
parameters.description: If true, then only tools that are meant to be selectable are returned

parameters.name: include_parents
parameters.description: If true, then include tools installed in all accounts above the current context

apis.description:
Returns a sessionless launch url for an external tool.

NOTE: Either the id or url must be provided unless launch_type is assessment or module_item.

operations.summary: Get a sessionless launch url for an external tool.
operations.notes:
Returns a sessionless launch url for an external tool.

NOTE: Either the id or url must be provided unless launch_type is assessment or module_item.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The external id of the tool to launch.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The LTI launch url for the external tool.

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: The assignment id for an assignment launch. Required if launch_type is set to "assessment".

parameters.name: module_item_id
parameters.description: The assignment id for a module item launch. Required if launch_type is set to "module_item".

parameters.name: launch_type
parameters.description:
The type of launch to perform on the external tool. Placement names (eg. "course_navigation")
can also be specified to use the custom launch url for that placement; if done, the tool id
must be provided.

apis.description:
Returns a sessionless launch url for an external tool.

NOTE: Either the id or url must be provided unless launch_type is assessment or module_item.

operations.summary: Get a sessionless launch url for an external tool.
operations.notes:
Returns a sessionless launch url for an external tool.

NOTE: Either the id or url must be provided unless launch_type is assessment or module_item.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The external id of the tool to launch.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The LTI launch url for the external tool.

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: The assignment id for an assignment launch. Required if launch_type is set to "assessment".

parameters.name: module_item_id
parameters.description: The assignment id for a module item launch. Required if launch_type is set to "module_item".

parameters.name: launch_type
parameters.description:
The type of launch to perform on the external tool. Placement names (eg. "course_navigation")
can also be specified to use the custom launch url for that placement; if done, the tool id
must be provided.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: external_tool_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: external_tool_id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description:
Create an external tool in the specified course/account.
The created tool will be returned, see the "show" endpoint for an example.

operations.notes:
Create an external tool in the specified course/account.
The created tool will be returned, see the "show" endpoint for an example.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the tool

parameters.name: privacy_level
parameters.description: What information to send to the external tool.

parameters.name: consumer_key
parameters.description: The consumer key for the external tool

parameters.name: shared_secret
parameters.description: The shared secret with the external tool

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the tool

parameters.name: url
parameters.description:
The url to match links against. Either "url" or "domain" should be set,
not both.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description:
The domain to match links against. Either "url" or "domain" should be
set, not both.

parameters.name: icon_url
parameters.description: The url of the icon to show for this tool

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The default text to show for this tool

parameters.name: custom_fields[field_name]
parameters.description:
Custom fields that will be sent to the tool consumer; can be used
multiple times

parameters.name: account_navigation[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool for account navigation

parameters.name: account_navigation[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: account_navigation[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show on the left-tab in the account navigation

parameters.name: account_navigation[selection_width]
parameters.description: The width of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: account_navigation[selection_height]
parameters.description: The height of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: user_navigation[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool for user navigation

parameters.name: user_navigation[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: user_navigation[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show on the left-tab in the user navigation

parameters.name: course_home_sub_navigation[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool for right-side course home navigation menu

parameters.name: course_home_sub_navigation[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: course_home_sub_navigation[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show on the right-side course home navigation menu

parameters.name: course_home_sub_navigation[icon_url]
parameters.description: The url of the icon to show in the right-side course home navigation menu

parameters.name: course_navigation[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: course_navigation[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show on the left-tab in the course navigation

parameters.name: course_navigation[visibility]
parameters.description:
Who will see the navigation tab. "admins" for course admins, "members" for
students, null for everyone

parameters.name: course_navigation[windowTarget]
parameters.description:
Determines how the navigation tab will be opened.
"_blank"	Launches the external tool in a new window or tab.
"_self"	(Default) Launches the external tool in an iframe inside of Canvas.

parameters.name: course_navigation[default]
parameters.description:
Whether the navigation option will show in the course by default or
whether the teacher will have to explicitly enable it

parameters.name: editor_button[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: editor_button[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: editor_button[icon_url]
parameters.description: The url of the icon to show in the WYSIWYG editor

parameters.name: editor_button[selection_width]
parameters.description: The width of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: editor_button[selection_height]
parameters.description: The height of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: editor_button[message_type]
parameters.description:
Set this to ContentItemSelectionRequest to tell the tool to use
content-item; otherwise, omit

parameters.name: homework_submission[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: homework_submission[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: homework_submission[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show on the homework submission tab

parameters.name: homework_submission[message_type]
parameters.description:
Set this to ContentItemSelectionRequest to tell the tool to use
content-item; otherwise, omit

parameters.name: link_selection[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: link_selection[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: link_selection[text]
parameters.description: The text that will show for the link selection text

parameters.name: link_selection[message_type]
parameters.description:
Set this to ContentItemSelectionRequest to tell the tool to use
content-item; otherwise, omit

parameters.name: migration_selection[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: migration_selection[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: migration_selection[message_type]
parameters.description:
Set this to ContentItemSelectionRequest to tell the tool to use
content-item; otherwise, omit

parameters.name: tool_configuration[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: tool_configuration[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: tool_configuration[message_type]
parameters.description:
Set this to ContentItemSelectionRequest to tell the tool to use
content-item; otherwise, omit

parameters.name: resource_selection[url]
parameters.description: The url of the external tool

parameters.name: resource_selection[enabled]
parameters.description: Set this to enable this feature

parameters.name: resource_selection[icon_url]
parameters.description: The url of the icon to show in the module external tool list

parameters.name: resource_selection[selection_width]
parameters.description: The width of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: resource_selection[selection_height]
parameters.description: The height of the dialog the tool is launched in

parameters.name: config_type
parameters.description:
Configuration can be passed in as CC xml instead of using query
parameters. If this value is "by_url" or "by_xml" then an xml
configuration will be expected in either the "config_xml" or "config_url"
parameter. Note that the name parameter overrides the tool name provided
in the xml

parameters.name: config_xml
parameters.description:
XML tool configuration, as specified in the CC xml specification. This is
required if "config_type" is set to "by_xml"

parameters.name: config_url
parameters.description:
URL where the server can retrieve an XML tool configuration, as specified
in the CC xml specification. This is required if "config_type" is set to
"by_url"

parameters.name: not_selectable
parameters.description:
Default: false, if set to true the tool won't show up in the external tool
selection UI in modules and assignments

parameters.name: oauth_compliant
parameters.description:
Default: false, if set to true LTI query params will not be copied to the
post body.
